DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate distance , intermediate , near vision aspheric multifocal diffractive AcrySof® ReSTOR SN6AD1 intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate distance , intermediate , near vision aspheric multifocal diffractive AcrySof® ReSTOR SN6AD1 intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation . Prospective study 50 patient cataract phacoemulsification AcrySof® ReSTOR IOL implantation . Uncorrected distance vision acuity ( UDVA ) , correct distance visual acuity ( CDVA ) , distance-corrected near visual acuity ( DCNVA ) , distance-corrected intermediate visual acuity ( DCIVA ) measure postoperatively . A patient-satisfaction visual phenomenon questionnaire administer end study .
DOC.criteria: Cataract Any race Either gender Diagnosis cataracts eye Preexisting physical condition could skew visual result , Diabetes , Retinal detachment , Macular degeneration , Cancer Subjects must < 1.00 diopter astigmatism Biometry result Restore patient target emmetropia +0.25 . Central endothelial cell count less 2000 cells/mm2 glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg amblyopia Retinal abnormality Diabetes mellitus steroid immunosuppressive treatment Connective tissue disease
